--- title: "Data Wrangling" author: "Jamila Rzaayeva" --- ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_8a1bf3b5401eb598f119224840756841'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(vroom) library(data.table) col_types <- list( id = col_character(), type = col_character(), number = col_character(), country = col_character(), date = col_date("%Y-%m-%d"), abstract = col_character(), title = col_character(), kind = col_character(), num_claims = col_double(), filename = col_character(), withdrawn = col_double() ) patent_tb1 <- vroom( file = '../../Patent_data_reduced/patent.tsv', delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: type, number, #> country, abstract, title, kind, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} assignee_tb1 <- vroom( file = '../../Patent_data_reduced/assignee.tsv', delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: number, #> country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} patent_assignee_tb1 <- vroom( file = '../../Patent_data_reduced/patent_assignee.tsv', delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL")) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: id, type, #> number, country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} uspc_tb1 <- vroom( file = '../../Patent_data_reduced/uspc.tsv', delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL")) %>% transform(patent_id = as.character(patent_id)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: id, type, #> number, country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} wrangled <- assignee_tb1 %>% left_join(patent_assignee_tb1, by = c("id" = "assignee_id")) %>% left_join(patent_tb1, by = c("patent_id" = "id")) %>% left_join(uspc_tb1, by = "patent_id") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: One or more parsing issues, call `problems()` on your data frame for details, #> e.g.: #> dat <- vroom(...) #> problems(dat) ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning in left_join(., uspc_tb1, by = "patent_id"): Detected an unexpected #> many-to-many relationship between `x` and `y`. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} patent_leaders <- sort(table(wrangled$organization), decreasing=T)[1:10] %>% as.data.frame() %>% mutate(Var1 = Var1 %>% str_to_title()) data.table( "Org" = patent_leaders$Var1, "Patents" = patent_leaders$Freq) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} wrangled_august <- wrangled %>% select(organization, date) %>% filter(date >= "2014-08-01" & date <= "2014-08-31") patent_leaders_august <- sort(table(wrangled_august$organization), decreasing=T)[1:10] %>% as.data.frame() %>% mutate(Var1 = Var1 %>% str_to_title()) data.table( "Org" = patent_leaders_august$Var1, "Patents" = patent_leaders_august$Freq) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} wrangled_class <- wrangled %>% select(organization, mainclass_id) %>% filter(organization %in% patent_leaders$Var1[1:10]) %>% subset(mainclass_id != "No longer published") class_leaders <- sort(table(wrangled_class$mainclass_id), decreasing=T)[1:5] %>% as.data.frame() %>% mutate(Var1 = Var1 %>% str_to_title()) data.table( "Main class" = class_leaders$Var1, "Patents" = class_leaders$Freq) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: :::
